attributes.action: give female pigeons the same right as male pigeons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that our community of female pigeons are being treated unfairly by their male counterparts, mainly pecking, stamping on the female's head...and sometimes un-lawful sexual act's.

Anyone who agree's with this should sign this petition!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
